lev.gui

Class LProgressBarFrame

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • java.awt.Window
          • java.awt.Frame
            • javax.swing.JFrame
              • lev.gui.LProgressBarFrame
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants, LProgressBarInterface

    public class LProgressBarFrame
extends javax.swing.JFrame
implements LProgressBarInterface
    A GUI window frame for LProgress bar. Used in SUMGUI.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
